protocol_name: Making low peptone NGM for imaging plates
protocol_name_html: Making low peptone NGM for imaging plates
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5vmld","text":"Reagents:","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ksns","text":"For 500ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"791ce","text":"A) Pre-Autoclave","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8301a","text":" Sodium Chloride- 1.5g","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46fcn","text":" Difco Agar- 10g","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8m87","text":" Difco Bactopeptone- 0.065g","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"big8g","text":" Cholesterol (5mg/ml in EtOH)- 0.5ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r68a","text":" Deionized water- 482.5ml\n\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fton","text":"B) Post-Autoclave","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g9nj","text":" 1M Cacl2- 0.5ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":8,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r834","text":" 1M MgSO4- 0.5ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":8,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbl7l","text":" 1M K2HPO4 (pH 6.0)- 12.5ml","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":5,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":9,"length":2,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"309bv","text":" Book the autoclave (notebook on top of the machine).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8jj73","text":" Take clean flasks from the glass kitchen.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1djq8","text":" Measure all the pre-autoclave reagents and add to the flask (Use a new weighing boat and spatula for each reagent. Also, the cholesterol is kept in the fridge.)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"du0k","text":" Once water is added mix thoroughly and label with autoclave tape (\u2018Low peptone NGM Rm 5020\u2019).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d1upm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0580EEB0D6C411E8A2A54940F897F787","id":676047,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Pre-Autoclave:"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"do41r","text":" When autoclave is complete, remove the probe flask ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9f79r","text":" Make sure to wear gloves as the flask will be hot","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fe27u","text":" Let the agar to cool to around 55\u00b0C and add the post autoclave reagents","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3iou4","text":" Mix it well and start pouring onto small imaging plates (3.5ml in each) using a 3mm tube  (See Protocol for plate pouring)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B8F6DB80D6C411E89E1E3F6D31256C93","id":676057,"previous_guid":"B46FD750D6C511E89E1E3F6D31256C93","section":"Post autoclave:"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n4ll","text":"     - Turn ON the autoclave","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5hcii","text":"     - Make sure that the autoclave\u2019s probe bottle is the same size as the largest bottle you use and fill it with water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6m9aj","text":"     - Place the temperature probe in it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"64o03","text":"     - Fill up the autoclave with water until it reaches the grill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e2tak","text":"     - Place the bottles in the autoclave and make sure that the cap is not screwed completely.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"15kuc","text":"     - Check the waste flask is not too full","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f30mb","text":"     - Use \u2018media\u2019 program. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3da1n","text":"     - Press START.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9b3ll","text":"     - It will take about 2 hours for 500ml to autoclave  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3or95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B46FD750D6C511E89E1E3F6D31256C93","id":676058,"previous_guid":"0580EEB0D6C411E8A2A54940F897F787","section":"Using the autoclave:"}
